Title: JMDCMS Content Management System
Description: JMDCMS is a powerfull module based Content Management System. Written in ASP.net and C# with SQL Server as database. Flexible automatic 3Col, 2Col, 1Col layout. Page Level / Module Level security and publishing control. Search engine friendly URL with ability to Set Page Title, Description and Keywords by page.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

JMDCMS is a powerfull module based Content Management System. Written in ASP.net and C# with SQL Server as database. Flexible automatic 3Col, 2Col, 1Col layout. Page Level / Module Level security and publishing control. Search engine friendly URL with ability to Set Page Title, Description and Keywords by page.

Get your own 100% free website @ http://www.freesitefor.me powered by JMDCMS hosted at secure AMAZON cloud.

Modules

About JMDCMS

  • Powered by Asp.net 4.0, C# and SQL Server 2000/2005/2008 R2.
  • One Directory, One Database, Multiple sites. Your domains, domain pointers,Virtual Directories, Subdomains can be completely different websites, even though all of them are pointing to same database and same directory.
  • User Defined Role based, Module Level Security.
  • Unlimited depth of Pages
  • Module based. New modules can be integrated easily.
  • CSS Template based layout.
  • Smart 1,2 or 3 column automatic layout.
  • Search Engine Friendly. Short and Simple URLs. Ability to set Meta Title, Description and Keywords by page.


official website: http://www.jmdcms.com
